Posted By: sarroth (1/28/2012 7:19:45 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Is it me or do we have an outrageously large amount of possible zombie lords in standard right now? Let me see...  
This, [Mikaeus, the Unhallowed](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mikaeus, the Unhallowed) and [Ravengul Runebinder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ravengul Runebinder), in Dark Ascension, [Adaptive Automaton](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Adaptive Automaton) and [Cemetery Reaper](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cemetery Reaper) in M12 and [Undead Alchemist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Undead Alchemist) in Innistrad.   
...FIVE LORDS? And that's without counting all other pro-zombie cards like [Call to the Grave](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Call to the Grave) and [Endless Ranks of the Dead](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Endless Ranks of the Dead). And the new zombie Bloodghast ([Gravecrawler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gravecrawler)).
posts.html:
Is it me or do we have an outrageously large amount of possible zombie lords in standard right now? Let me see...
This, Mikaeus, the Unhallowed and Ravengul Runebinder, in Dark Ascension, Adaptive Automaton and Cemetery Reaper in M12 and Undead Alchemist in Innistrad.
...FIVE LORDS? And that's without counting all other pro-zombie cards like Call to the Grave and Endless Ranks of the Dead. And the new zombie Bloodghast (Gravecrawler).

Posted By: NinaNinja (1/27/2012 7:59:51 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Commander Review: not bad, not great. It's just a 2/2 which is quite a pity, because in Commander it will die too easily. Just it's deathtouch rescues it a bit from beeing instantly stomped over. The +1/+1 bonus is cute, but not that relevant. As such, if you run an aggressive Commander deck with 15 to 20 or more zombies, you might consider adding him. But if you skip him, your deck wouldn't lose too much either.  
2/5
posts.html:

2/5

posts.post_content:
Not as good as [Drogskol Captain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Drogskol Captain),  
but an amazing enabler nonetheless.  
  
B/U Zombies just became a \*lot\* stronger.   
This + [Gravecrawler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gravecrawler) + [Grimgrin, Corpse-born](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grimgrin, Corpse-born) = OUCH.  
Even nastier if you can get [Mikaeus, the Unhallowed](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mikaeus, the Unhallowed) out!  
  
I totally dig it... 5/5.
posts.html:

Posted By: pedrodyl (1/27/2012 5:07:14 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
[Diregraf Captain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Diregraf Captain) + [Grimgrin, Corpse-Born](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grimgrin, Corpse-Born) + [Gravecrawler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gravecrawler )  = Opponents loses X life points. X is the ![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) mana you have.  
  
1) Put [Gravecrawler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gravecrawler )  on the field  
2) Put [Diregraf Captain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Diregraf Captain) on the field  
3) Put [Grimgrin, Corpse-Born](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grimgrin, Corpse-Born) on the field.  
4) sac [Gravecrawler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gravecrawler )  by using Grimgrin second ability; pay ![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) and bring him back on the field. Opponent would lose 1 life point each time you bring him back.  
  
This would be more fun if you have more than one of [Diregraf Captain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Diregraf Captain) on the field.
posts.html:
Diregraf Captain + Grimgrin, Corpse-Born + Gravecrawler = Opponents loses X life points. X is the mana you have.

1) Put Gravecrawler on the field
2) Put Diregraf Captain on the field
3) Put Grimgrin, Corpse-Born on the field.
4) sac Gravecrawler by using Grimgrin second ability; pay and bring him back on the field. Opponent would lose 1 life point each time you bring him back.

This would be more fun if you have more than one of Diregraf Captain on the field.

posts.post_content: Second favorite zombie lord, after [Death Baron](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Death Baron). It beats out [Lord of the Undead](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lord of the Undead) and [Cemetery Reaper](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cemetery Reaper) now that [Gravecrawler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gravecrawler) exists. Obviously [Mikaeus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=249896) is sweet, but for the same cost you could have 2 of these out.
posts.html:
Second favorite zombie lord, after Death Baron. It beats out Lord of the Undead and Cemetery Reaper now that Gravecrawler exists. Obviously Mikaeus is sweet, but for the same cost you could have 2 of these out.
